shared.definitions

Class Hex

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.definitions.Hex

  • public class Hex
extends java.lang.Object
    class to represent a Hex on the board Contains a location, a resource, and the number that goes on that particular hex
    Author:
    bbarney7

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private HexLocation location
      x and y corrdinates of the hex
      private int number
      Number to be rolled to receive resources of the hex
      private ResourceType resource
      resource that the hex represents and offers
